body:
Comment 1: 
Are you sure you removed and old versions of Go before installing 1.2rc3 from source 

> /local/go/pkg/tool/darwin_amd64/6l: running gcc failed: unsuccessful exit status 0x100

If this path is /usr/local/go/... then it is possible you have several versions of Go on
your system.

Can you please

1. unset GOROOT if set
2. if GOROOT was set, rebuild your source go again as it will be confused by the
incorrect goroot setting
3. check that `which go` returns the go binary matching your 1.2rc3 source install.
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
